reviews.body: I was born with sacralization - my L5 is compressed and lower than it's supposed to be, which causes me daily pain and discomfort along with trouble walking at times. I was introduced to Ben and the team at RPT, and they have changed my life. I feel better, I can walk better, and I can do things I could never do!

Well I don't know where to start I'm very active and in the gym 5 days a week, well this was all until I woke up with really bad back pain . I figured it was just a muscle and would get better, well here we're 6 monks later, seen two different chiropractors and nothing.

Having a lower left hip issue as I am in dentistry and alot of my days include bad posture to make patients comfortable. Ben and his team took such good care of me. I felt better instantly and feel like I have a new beginning. I will definitely be returning again.

These miracle workers exhibit the best patient care I've ever experienced. They heal people! My dedication to Robotic Precision Therapy, Ben Blankenship and his staff is cemented by experiencing healing.

I cannot recommend Robotic Precision Therapy highly enough! As a professional athlete, I have experienced firsthand the incredible benefits of their cutting-edge therapy services. The staff here is truly exceptional - knowledgeable, friendly, and dedicated to helping clients achieve their best.

I had shoulder issues and after 3 sessions I have had significant pain relief.  But the biggest change is my Vertigo.  I had told Ben how I've had Vertigo for several years and with one treatment it's gone!  I still can't believe it.  I highly recommend RPT.

The team at RPT is incredible.  Their knowledge is unmatched and their care is always top notch. The robots are truly remarkable and have healed issues no doctor, Chiro or PT has ever been able to.  Highly recommended if you're in any kind of pain or discomfort

had a severe herniated disc. My massage therapist recommended RPT. I gave it a try and now have almost 100% movement back in my shoulder. I thought I was going to have surgery but this therapy is a dream and works without any invasive surgery and I couldnâ€™t be happier.

This is not miracle work, it is science! I had terrible back and knee pain. It's not just the robot, but the knowledgeable practitioners who helped heal me within a few weeks. I've been pain free now for 6 months and go back once every few months.

I came with completely blocked hip flexors to the point I could not train anymore, among a bunch of other blockages. This incredible technology and the knowledge of the team fixed me up and I will be back for sure if it happens again.
